description: This source file defines URL routing for the notes backend API using Django's URL dispatcher. It maps URL patterns to view functions or class-based views for health checks and CRUD operations on notes.

classes.name: NoteListCreateView
classes.description: A class-based view handling listing and creation of notes.

classes.name: NoteRetrieveUpdateDestroyView
classes.description: A class-based view handling retrieve, update, and delete operations for individual notes.

methods.name: health
methods.description: A view function for health check endpoint.

methods.name: NoteListCreateView.as_view
methods.description: Converts the class-based view into a view function for URL routing.

methods.name: NoteRetrieveUpdateDestroyView.as_view
methods.description: Converts the class-based view into a view function for URL routing.
